column6:
A NEW INVASION MUST BE STOPPED!
  • Reeling from last issue's stunning revelation, THE ALL-NEW INVADERS discover a devastating new threat! What is the secret behind the abduction of THOMAS RAYMOND, the TORCH'S old sidekick TORO? Can NAMOR, the WINTER SOLDIER and the HUMAN TORCH save humanity or is it already too late? A new arc and the return of fan favorite artist, STEVE PUGH!!!
column8: | penciller (cover):Greg Land | artist:Steve Pugh | writer:James Robinson
